posts.title: New NASA Study Tallies Carbon Emissions From Massive Canadian Fires
posts.short_description: Extreme wildfires like these will continue to have a large impact on global climate. Stoked by Canada’s warmest and driest conditions in decades, extreme forest fires in 2023 released about 640 million metric tons of carbon, NASA scientists have found.…
